title: Petrified Forest National Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved?  NPS Centennial 2016 is the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. Find out what we're doing to get ready, and look for ways that you can help. Our Partners We can't do it alone. Our non-profit partners play a vital role in the success of Petrified Forest National Park. Find out how to become a member of our partner organizations. Donate Find out how to make financial donations. Volunteer There are always opportunities available for you to volunteer your time and skills to Petrified Forest.  Work with Us Keep an eye out for year-round or seasonal positions with the National Park Service, as well as youth engagement through a conservation group. Planning The public is invited to express opinions in project management. Sustainability Learn what we are doing to minimize our impact on the environment. Artist-in-Residence Cultural Demonstators These Special Programs offer visitors an opportunity to talk to artists and artisans from near and far about how the area inspires their work. Learn about events or how to become an artist or demonstrator yourself.
